contentrichtext.text: '''Matignon Accords''' or '''Matignon Agreements''' may refer to: *The [[Matignon Agreements (1936)|Matignon Agreements of 1936]], an agreement between the [[France|French]] government, employers and labour guaranteeing trade union membership and negotiating rights, a 40-hour working week and paid workers' holidays. *The [[Matignon Agreements (1988)|Matignon Agreements of 1988]], an agreement for increased [[New Caledonia]]n territorial autonomy between the French government, [[Kanak people|Kanak]] independence activists and French settlers. {{disambig}}
